name: 3D PLATFORMER: HONORS PROJECT
description:
Hello! This is my 3D platformer game that I created for Michigan State University's CAS 117: Games and Interactivity course. The game was created using assets from MSU, with the music produced on garage band by me and the levels designed by me. 

The three modifications that I created for the game are as follows:

1) For my first modification, I created 3 unique, new, levels which show a progression through the world of the game and increase in complexity as the game moves on.

2) For my second modification, I made a custom score (music) for the game that fits the setting of space and gives an electronic / arcade feel to the game. I made this on garage band. 

3) For my third modification, I redesigned and updated the main menu UI for the game. The main character can now jump around in a cave environment while you decide which button on the main menu to hit. I also adjusted the size of the main menu so that you can see a little more of the player. 

Thank you for playing, and I hope you enjoyed! Thank you for a great semester.
